page.title: 03INTERVIEW WITH RESIDENT 2.
page.content: Interview with Mr. Dodsworth, a farmer from Welton. ####################### What would have been a typical day in your life 25 years ago? We were milking about 15 cows then, with buckets. We were growing a variety of crops, oats, potatoes, sugerbeet and grass. What about today? We are milking about 60 cows now with machines. We only grow wheat and barley now, not such a wide range of crops. What sort of entertainment did you have? We chased the girls, went to dances and the cinema and about the same things you do now. The cinema was in Lincoln and cost about 25p , much cheaper than the Â£2.20. now.
